channel.title: One of the best way's to get mage exp without losing money!
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]This is really sloppy work & I was really tired last night and just put it down on here... So Imma fix it when i get the chance to again, gtg to sleep now...[/b][/size] Im not gonna make this perfect, but I am going to make it straight forward and to the point of this thread, so lets me start off to say that our main goal is to get 'infinity top' which currently cost 1813k at lowest price: Go get the points at mage mini game near duel arena and get the following points: Telekinetic Points Alchemist Points Enchantment Points Graveyard Points 400 450 4000 400 Just buy 3k cosmics, 12.7k airs, 2.1k nats, 9.6k fires, 700 laws, and 680 water & earth runes. This would cost you 1749k leaving you with a profit of approximately 64k. [hr] I've heard that you can get about 96k exp by using a bot, so I calculated that to the 13m exp that leads to a nice level 99. From the look of it, it would take you about 5 or basically 1 week letting your bot play 10 hours a day straight. You'll get it. Also Here is what I did to get the solution:
Telekinetic Points Alchemist Points Enchantment Points Graveyard Points 400 450 4000 400 -*Amount | Rune-Name | Price(Max) | Total-Cost*- 3000 Cosmic Rune = 170gp ea = 510,000gp 12,700 Air Rune = 16gp ea = 203, 200gp 2,120 Nature Rune = 300gp ea = 636, 000gp 9,600 Fire Rune = 16gp ea = 153, 600gp 700 Law Rune = 321gp ea = 224, 700gp 680 Water Rune = 16gp ea = 10, 880gp 680 Earth Rune = 16gp ea = 10, 880gp Infinity Top Cost at lower price: 1813k All rune cost together: 1749k Ending Result: 64k
96k = 1hr 1hr x 10hr = 960k(or approximately 1m) 10hr x 13hr = 12,4m // So then there would need to be at least 1 week of 10 hours a day put into this Level met: 98 Experience Left: 600k // so thats like 180 hours put into it for 99....yeah lol long
Btw this was done on paper lol

item.title: One of the best way's to get mage exp without losing money!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

What are those? Summoning items?
I just cut/fletch/high alch yew longs, and buy bow strings and nats.

Read full topic

item.title: One of the best way's to get mage exp without losing money!
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[size=12pt]This is really sloppy work & I was really tired last night and just put it down on here… So Imma fix it when i get the chance to again, gtg to sleep now…[/size]

Im not gonna make this perfect, but I am going to make it straight forward and to the point of this thread, so lets me start off to say that our main goal is to get ‘infinity top’ which currently cost 1813k at lowest price:

Go get the points at mage mini game near duel arena and get the following points:

Telekinetic Points Alchemist Points Enchantment Points Graveyard Points
400 450 4000 400

Just buy 3k cosmics, 12.7k airs, 2.1k nats, 9.6k fires, 700 laws, and 680 water & earth runes. This would cost you 1749k leaving you with a profit of approximately 64k.

[hr]

I’ve heard that you can get about 96k exp by using a bot, so I calculated that to the 13m exp that leads to a nice level 99. From the look of it, it would take you about 5 or basically 1 week letting your bot play 10 hours a day straight. You’ll get it. Also Here is what I did to get the solution:

Telekinetic Points Alchemist Points Enchantment Points Graveyard Points 400 450 4000 400 
-*Amount | Rune-Name | Price(Max) | Total-Cost*-
3000 Cosmic Rune = 170gp ea = 510,000gp
12,700 Air Rune = 16gp ea = 203, 200gp
2,120 Nature Rune = 300gp ea = 636, 000gp
9,600 Fire Rune = 16gp ea = 153, 600gp
700 Law Rune = 321gp ea = 224, 700gp
680 Water Rune = 16gp ea = 10, 880gp
680 Earth Rune = 16gp ea = 10, 880gp

Infinity Top Cost at lower price: 1813k
All rune cost together: 1749k
Ending Result: 64k</blockquote>
96k = 1hr 1hr x 10hr = 960k(or approximately 1m) 10hr x 13hr = 12,4m // So then there would need to be at least 1 week of 10 hours a day put into this Level met: 98 Experience Left: 600k // so thats like 180 hours put into it for 99....yeah lol long

Btw this was done on paper lol

Read full topic
